sense.gloss: national expenditure, government spending, public funds

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の↑消費↑↓しょうひ↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓は、↑外国↑↓がい|こく↓↑品↑↓ひ|ん↓の↑輸入↑↓ゆにゅう↓に↑対↑↓たい↓する↑様々↑↓さまざま↓な↑規制↑↓きせい↓を↑取↑↓と↓り↑崩↑↓くず↓そうとするアメリカ↑政府↑↓せいふ↓の↑努力↑↓どりょく↓を↑注意深↑↓ちゅういぶか↓く↑見守↑↓みまも↓っている。
sdata.e: Japanese consumers are watching closely the U.S. government's efforts to make Japan dismantle various restrictions on imports of foreign goods into the country.

sdata.e: Taking the opportunity for President Obama to visit Japan as a state guest, the chief trade negotiators of Japan and the U.S. conducted a series of marathon meetings from midnight to early morning.
